add up.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to calculate the total of several numbers
add up.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I can add up in my head quite easily.
Specialized software adds up the statistics.
add up.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if a set of facts does not add up, it does not provide a reasonable explanation for a situation
add up.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He was troubled by a feeling that things just didn’t add up.
add up.translation[0].definitions[2].def: if sums, numbers etc do not add up, there is a mistake in them
add up.translation[0].definitions[3].def: used to say that lots of small amounts gradually make a large total
add up.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: There are five of us using the phone so it all adds up.
